long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows users to visualize short-term rental areas in Quebec, Canada on Google Maps by adding circles and polygons to the map. It is designed to help users easily identify areas available for short-term rental.
